title: Low Priority Queue for No reason.
body: I was low priority Queued for no god damn reason?? I didn't leave the game. I was just lagging a bit and I feel that I don't deserve to be queue banned

replies.body: i got low priority queued for no reason as well the game lagged out and gave me the damn bug splat i sent the message in and hit them up on the support  message center and still haven't received any love

While we can't adjust any low priority queues from the boards, we _can_ help you fix that lag! It sounds like your network may have been having a hard time keeping a stable connection with the game server, so check out our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

If that doesn't help, hit me back up and let me know what happens when you start lagging.
